org.apache.reef.tang.formats

Interface ConfigurationSerializer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AvroConfigurationSerializer

    @DefaultImplementation(value=AvroConfigurationSerializer.class)
public interface ConfigurationSerializer
    A base interface for Configuration serializers.

                       throws IOException,
                              BindException
        Loads a Configuration from a File created with toFile().

        Returns:
        the Configuration stored in the file.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the File can't be read or parsed
        BindException - if the file contains an illegal Configuration
